duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support to Race & Sports wagering Guests via inbound calls, e-mail, and chat.
Deliver excellent customer service on every interaction.
Support Guest engagement for application downloads, logon questions, password resets, and other general technical troubleshooting where necessary.

education_certification.credential: L1 HD experience in technical call center environment. Must be 21+ years old and able to obtain a Nevada Gaming License. Relevant experience and knowledge of sports betting and gaming industry.
